unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian auto scene is buzzing with new vehicle launches hotter than jalebis straight from the kadhai.
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian auto scene is buzzing with new vehicle launches hotter than jalebis straight from the kadhai.

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra's revamped Scorpio N is making waves, promising a rugged ride perfect for those Ladakh adventures. They're saying it's got more tech than ISRO and more power than a Rajdhani Express!
normalised: First up, Mahindra's revamped Scorpio N is making waves, promising a rugged ride perfect for those Ladakh adventures. They're saying it's got more tech than I S R O and more power than a Rajdhani Express!

unnormalised: Then there's Maruti Suzuki, unleashing their next-gen Alto 800. Apparently, Dr. Sharma from the R&D department claims it's more fuel-efficient than ever – getting you from Delhi to Agra on just a tankful! (Almost!).
normalised: Then there's Maruti Suzuki, unleashing their next-gen Alto eight hundred. Apparently, Doctor Sharma from the R and D department claims it's more fuel-efficient than ever – getting you from Delhi to Agra on just a tankful! (Almost!).

unnormalised: Tata Motors is also in the game with a new electric variant of the Nexon, boasting a range of over 400 km. Forget range anxiety, now you can worry about finding parking in Mumbai.
normalised: Tata Motors is also in the game with a new electric variant of the Nexon, boasting a range of over four hundred kilometer. Forget range anxiety, now you can worry about finding parking in Mumbai.

unnormalised: Rumours are also swirling about a new SUV from Hyundai, codenamed 'Creta Killer'. Sounds intense!
normalised: Rumours are also swirling about a new S U V from Hyundai, codenamed 'Creta Killer'. Sounds intense!

unnormalised: Pricing wars are already heating up, with manufacturers trying to undercut each other by thousands of Rs. Expect some sweet deals coming your way.
normalised: Pricing wars are already heating up, with manufacturers trying to undercut each other by thousands of of rupees. Expect some sweet deals coming your way.

unnormalised: Speaking of deals, the new showroom in Chandni Chowk boasts a massive 5000 sq ft display area – enough space to park a small army of cars.
normalised: Speaking of deals, the new showroom in Chandni Chowk boasts a massive five thousand square feet display area – enough space to park a small army of cars.

unnormalised: Keep your eyes peeled, folks! The roads are about to get a whole lot more interesting.
normalised: Keep your eyes peeled, folks! The roads are about to get a whole lot more interesting.
